class.name: LocatorbasedColliderHelper
class.brief_description: Is used by the LocatorbasedCollider.gd (as an optimization)

method.name: InitializeAsCircle
method.description: Initializes the Locatorbased Collider as a Circle collider.

method.name: InitializeAsRectangle
method.description: Initializes the Locatorbased Collider as a Rectangle collider.

method.name: InitializeAsCircleMotion
method.description: Initializes the Locatorbased Collider as a Circle Motion collider.

method.name: SetHelperActive
method.description: The collider will only be updated, when it is set to active (default is true!)

method.name: GetCurrentCollidingObjects
method.description: Simply returns the current colliding objects array (can contain invalid or queue-freed objects, so please check for that!)

method.name: UpdateAllHelpers
method.description: Updates all the LocatorbasedColliderHelpers that were created. Has to be called exactly once per frame.

signal.name: CollisionStarted
signal.description: This Signal is triggered whenever a Game Object first the collider. (can be reset by the ResetEverySeconds, so that it is triggered again)

signal.name: CollisionEnded
signal.description: This Signal is triggered whenever a Game Object leaves the collider.
